info.author: Jarn AS
info.description:
Update 2013-05-27: I'm no longer using this project, if somebody wants to take over maintanance, email me.

Introduction
============

This portlet will look in a specified folder for Quote content objects 
(also in this package) and show one of them randomly. Quote objects 
have a text field for the quote, a source for the source of the quote
and an optional link.


Changelog
=========

1.0.1 (2009-11-25)
------------------

- The source dist didn't include the docs directory for some reason, so 1.0 was not installable.


1.0 (2009-11-24)
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.portlet.quote
info.summary: A portlet showing random quotes from a folder
info.html_description:
Update 2013-05-27: I’m no longer using this project, if somebody wants to take over maintanance, email me.

Introduction

This portlet will look in a specified folder for Quote content objects (also in this package) and show one of them randomly. Quote objects have a text field for the quote, a source for the source of the quote and an optional link.

Changelog

1.0.1 (2009-11-25)

  • The source dist didn’t include the docs directory for some reason, so 1.0 was not installable.

1.0 (2009-11-24)

  • Initial release
